    public class AbstractDart
extends AbstractPhysicalGameObject

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractDart

        public AbstractDart(java.lang.String blastSpriteSheetPath,
                    int tileWidth,
                    int tileHeight,
                    int bloomRGB,
                    double theta,
                    int speed,
                    float ttl,
                    java.awt.Point origin)
        Initialize an abstract blast game object
        Parameters:
        blastSpriteSheetPath - - the blast sprite sheet
        tileWidth - - the tile width
        tileHeight - - the tile height
        bloomRGB - - the bloom RGB color (RGB!! No alpha!)
        theta - - the angle to travel
        speed - - the speed to travel
        aliveTime - - the time this projectile can go on for
        origin - - the point of origin for this projectile
